LanguageData.DMS_Bullet_BlasterSmoke.label: blaster screen shell
LanguageData.Shell_BlasterSmoke.label: Blaster Screen Shell
LanguageData.Shell_BlasterSmoke.description: An artillery shell containing reagents that generate an active-particle field which triggers charged ammo's detonation mid-flight. These shells are a preferred countermeasure while fighting against mech legions and mid-world megacorps. Does not effect other projectiles.
LanguageData.Shell_BlasterSmoke_Releasing.label: blaster screen shell
LanguageData.Shell_BlasterSmoke_Releasing_Water.label: blaster screen shell
